verificationSystem.title: Verification System
description: We have two distinct types of tags to help gauge one's abilities.
â€ƒ ğŸ”¹ **Prerequisites**

â€ƒ ğŸ”¹ **Ranks**
â€ƒ â€ƒ â–«ï¸â€ƒ A roadmap through all trials in the game based on difficulty level.
Each prerequisite and rank tag have a symbol indicating in-game roles:
â€ƒ âš”ï¸â€ƒ **Damage Dealers**

All screenshots and achievements **must be your own**. If you are found using someone else's screenshots or have bought a trial carry without disclosing, your roles will be removed and you will not be rostered.

prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
description: Measures a player raw capabilities independently of any clears.
â€â€â€
Go to <#716449967149023242> or <#750677985996308520> to post parses (Damage Dealers) and gear (Tanks and Healers) screenshots to get prerequisite tags.
Keep in mind the following rules:
â€ƒ ğŸ”¹â€ƒ **Damage Dealers**
â€ƒ â€ƒ â–«ï¸â€ƒ Must be done on a 21m trial dummy.
â€ƒ â€ƒ â–«ï¸â€ƒ [Mythic Items](https://eso-sets.com/sets/type/mythic) **ARE NOT** allowed.
â€ƒ â€ƒ â–«ï¸â€ƒ [Blood for Blood](https://eso-hub.com/en/skills/world/vampire/blood-for-blood)  **IS NOT** allowed.
â€ƒ â€ƒ â–«ï¸â€ƒ [Blood Frenzy](https://eso-hub.com/en/skills/world/vampire/blood-frenzy) (and its morphs) **ARE NOT** allowed.
â€ƒ â€ƒ â–«ï¸â€ƒ Make sure to post your CMX information tab along with your parse.
â€ƒ ğŸ”¹â€ƒ **Healers and Tanks**
â€ƒ â€ƒ â–«ï¸â€ƒ Must have specific sets outlined in the prerequisites sections below.
â€ƒ â€ƒ â–«ï¸â€ƒ Perfected versions of sets *are not* required.
â€ƒ â€ƒ â–«ï¸â€ƒ Gear Collection (Sticker Book) screenshots **ARE NOT** allowed.
